file_content.text: That's it. I give up!
Spent three weeks getting those tightwads at requisitions to cough up some supplies. Three weeks!
Why doesn't the Republic just send the supplies to the other outposts directly?
You're a middleman?
That's life for you.
Those were crucial supplies. Rations, heat packs, thermal generator parts... everything a growing boy needs to survive on Hoth.
At least the supplies weren't destroyed. You can still get them back.
Have hope.
Assuming those blasted pirates haven't used it all up already.
Getting mad about it won't solve anything.
Calm down.
Yeah, but it sure feels good.
Get requisitions on the line. Put in another order.
Ask for more, then.
What, and wait another three weeks? No thank you.
Too bad. But hey, if you ever need someone reliable to deliver those goods....
Use a smuggler next time.
Crisis first. Business later.
I'm just a supply officer--I fill out forms and get the troops their holovids. But you--you could get those supplies back, right?
Absolutely.
You're a lifesaver!
Where are the pirates?
You'll find the pirates holed up in an old abandoned mine.
No can do. [Refuse quest]
Yeah? Name one.
Not now.
Appreciate you getting the supplies back for us.
Looks like it's all here. Must say, I'm impressed. Thank you.
Now, if you'll excuse me, I need to have a talk with requisitions to make sure this never happens again. Take care.
Those blasted pirates better not eat all our food.
Finally get them to send us a load of goods, and what happens? Bunch of White Maws hijack the shipment and steal everything. Typical!
What will you do?
I guess we start placing bets on whether we starve or freeze first.
We're completely isolated out here. We don't get those supplies, we won't last.
I'm just a supply officer. I can barely shoot straight. But you could get those supplies back, right?
Coordinates are here. Get the supplies back from those thieves and we just might pull through.
